# Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(base)
library(patchwork)
library(scales)
library(ggridges)
library(patchwork)

```


```{r}
# Create the data directory programmatically
dir.create(path="data")

# Retrieve the data directly (rhc = right hear catherization)
rhc_data <- read_csv(file = "https://hbiostat.org/data/repo/rhc.csv")

# Write the data to disk
write_csv(x = rhc_data,
          file = "data/rhc.csv")
```
